summary.title: Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML) Minimal Residual Disease Flow Cytometry
summary.abstract: Raw flow cytometry files for MRD assessment in 300 AML patients at post-induction and post-consolidation timepoints. Linked to cytogenetic risk groups.

documentation.description: Raw flow cytometry files for MRD assessment in 300 AML patients at post-induction and post-consolidation timepoints. Linked to cytogenetic risk groups. This is a dummy description generated for testing purposes.

project.projectName: AML-MRD: Standardizing Flow Cytometry for Minimal Residual Disease
project.leadResearchInstitute: Oxford University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
project.projectScope: Multi-color flow cytometry data for the detection of minimal residual disease (MRD) in acute myeloid leukemia.
